description:
The fastest, easiest mobile live streaming app, with millions of users around the world. 
Broadcast, chat, share real-time experiences with your friends and followers, check out and discover other broadcasters and places around the world - all from your iPhone. 

Go live with your mobile using your Twitter or Facebook account - one tap and you’re broadcasting.  Notify your Twitter followers and Facebook friends - they can watch you wherever they are - on their PC or Mac, iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad with our Viewer.  Read and respond to your viewers’ live comments.  Start your broadcast in Collabo mode and invite your viewers - up to 6 of them - to broadcast together with you! 

Your questions and feedback are always welcome!   
Need help? Hit us up at: https://ssl.twitcasting.tv/indexsupport.php


FEATURES:

* Live stream video and audio with low latency technology (0.3 - 3.0sec).
* Dynamically adjusts to network quality
* Connect to Bluetooth microphones, headphones.
* Update twitter timeline and status while broadcasting.
* Post your broadcast to your Facebook wall.
* Save your broadcasts on our web site.
* Send Push Notifications to alert your audience within a second.
(audience members need to subscribe to your broadcast in advance).
* Broadcast together with your friends.
* Up to 6 people broadcasting on one screen
* Optimized mobile experience  


LANGUAGES:
English, Japanese, Portuguese and others

REQUIREMENTS:
iOS4-iOS8
trackCensoredName: TwitCasting Live - Broadcast Video and Radio for Free
